text: Hugo Manuel Gomes dos Santos e Santos, known as Hugo (born 23 December 1972) is a former Portuguese football player. He played 10 seasons and 195 games in the Primeira Liga for União de Leiria, Farense and Beira-Mar. ==Club career== He made his Primeira Liga debut on 22 March 1992 for Farense as a late substitute in a 3–0 victory over Vitória de Guimarães. ==References== ==External links== Category:1972 births Category:People from Mértola Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:S.C. title: Hugo Santos (footballer, born 1972)
